name: Crime in Progress
description:
All new game for the Ouya!

Find the 20 missing presents, But watch out for the Criminals!

Jump, punch and kick your way through a small city level, as you find both presents and baddies!

Made in roughly 7 - 8 hours

Still Need to get controller support working on an actual Ouya. (fixed 12-16-2019)

Controller support works in the Unity editor and on Windows Version.

Xbox 360 Controller recommended for Windows Version (No Keyboard controls)

Still need to fix collecting 20 items takes you to credits screen ( fixed on Windows, and Ouya! 12-16-2019)
